author: baba_yaga69420
content:
hey there quick question, are there any examples of projects using Homomorphic encryption projects on any evm chains? Is it even possible on any l2s now?

author: sky.cactus
content: Last I checked, FHE is too slow to realistically use in most blockchain contexts.  I may be out of date though.

author: _shemnon
content: I always thought it was the kilobyte to megabyte encrypted values not the operaional speed that was more of a blocker.
